plot outline: Dilemma of a middle age boy when he has to choose between mother and his lover.. Dhanajaya Is a architect who falls in love with his mother's friend's daughter Sangeetha,,,Sangeetha comes to Bangalore to Dhanajaya's house to pursue her higher studies .. over a period of time both start to like each other.. when truth is known to both the mother's things take ugly turn..
title: Eradane Sala
plot: A widow tells her son to keep his distance from the girl who will be living with them. He tries his best to not develop any feelings towards her but eventually falls in love with her.

Dilemma of a middle age boy when he has to choose between mother and his lover.. Dhanajaya Is a architect who falls in love with his mother's friend's daughter Sangeetha,,,Sangeetha comes to Bangalore to Dhanajaya's house to pursue her higher studies .. over a period of time both start to like each other.. when truth is known to both the mother's things take ugly turn..::nitinjc
